faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about Trokacha

q1.question: When will Trokacha be available?
q1.answer: Trokacha will be available very soon on iOS and Android. Sign up for the newsletter to be notified at launch!

q2.question: How does bartering work on Trokacha?
q2.answer: It's simple! Post your ad, browse other users' offers, and propose an exchange. If the other person accepts, you can discuss the details via chat.

q3.question: Is parcel transport secure?
q3.answer: Yes! Each carrier is verified and rated by the community. You can track your parcel in real-time and communicate directly with the carrier.

q4.question: Is Trokacha free?
q4.answer: Yes, Trokacha is completely free! No hidden fees, no subscription. Our business model is based on optional premium features.

q5.question: In which cities is Trokacha available?
q5.answer: Trokacha will be available in all wilayas of Algeria at launch. Our goal is to connect Algerians from Tamanrasset to Annaba!

q6.question: How to become a carrier on Trokacha?
q6.answer: Just create an account and activate the carrier option. You can then see transport requests on your routes and offer your services.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: In accordance with Law 18-07 of June 10, 2018 relating to the protection of natural persons in the processing of personal data, amended by Law 11-25 of July 2025, Trokacha is committed to protecting the personal data of its users.

a2.title: Article 2 - Data Collected
a2.intro: Trokacha only collects data necessary for the operation of the service:
items: Identification data (name, first name, date of birth)
Contact details (email address, phone number)
For drivers: copy of driving license
Browsing and platform usage data
Transaction data (ad history, exchanges, reviews)

a3.title: Article 3 - Legal Basis for Processing
items: The express and informed consent of the user
The execution of the service contract
Trokacha's legal obligations
Legitimate interests (fraud prevention, service improvement)

a4.title: Article 4 - Your Rights
a4.intro: In accordance with Law 18-07, you have the following rights:
items: Right of access to your personal data
Right to rectification of inaccurate data
Right to erasure of data (right to be forgotten)
Right to object to processing
Right to restriction of processing
Right to data portability
Right to withdraw your consent at any time
a4.contact: These rights can be exercised by contacting

a5.title: Article 5 - Data Retention
items: During the period of active account use
3 years after the last account activity
Then archived in accordance with legal obligations
Permanently deleted at the end of this period

a6.title: Article 6 - Data Security
a6.intro: Trokacha implements appropriate technical and organizational measures:
items: Encryption of sensitive data
Strict access controls
Regular security audits
Staff training

a7.title: Article 7 - Breach Notification
a7.content: In the event of a data breach likely to result in a high risk to your rights and freedoms, Trokacha will notify the ANPDP within 5 days (in accordance with Law 11-25) and affected users as soon as possible.

a8.title: Article 8 - Data Transfers
a8.content: Personal data is hosted in Algeria. Any transfer to a foreign country will require prior authorization from the ANPDP and appropriate guarantees.

a9.title: Article 9 - Right to Complain
a9.content: You can file a complaint with the National Personal Data Protection Authority (ANPDP) if you believe your rights have not been respected.
